62055.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>Oh! We've been waiting for you!I can
only rely on <pc> who has
walked with me all the way here!<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62055.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「おお！　待っていたでンスよ！ 
　ここまでの道のりを　一緒に歩んできた
　<pc>さんだけが　頼りでンス！<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62056.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>As a matter of fact, we now know the
whereabouts of the Gorgonza gang that
took the master.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62056.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「じつは　ご主人さまを連れ去った
　ゴルゴンザ一味の居場所が　わかったでンス。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62057.en:
Gorgonza has a hideout camp in the depths of Megilaza Cave in the Megistris Territory of the Pukuland
Continent.
62057.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「ゴルゴンザは　プクランド大陸の
　メギストリス領にある　メギラザの洞くつの
　最深部に　アジトを構えているでンスよ。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62058.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>So he has his men build a gate back to
Demon World. The gate will be
completed soon.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62058.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「そこで　奴は　手下たちに
　魔界に戻るための門を　作らせているでンスよ。
　門は　もうすぐ　完成しようとしてるでンス。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62059.en:
If this continues, the master will be taken back to Demon World, and the enhanced drugs will be mass-produced,
and the enhanced ground troops will invade our world.
62059.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「このままじゃ　ご主人さまは　魔界に連れ戻され
　強化薬が量産されて　強化された　地上制圧隊が
　こっちの世界に　攻めてくるでンスよ……。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62060.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>The master's dream is that the item
master created by himself will defeat
the born strong man, Captain Gorgonza.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62060.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「ご主人さまの夢は　自らが生み出した
　どうぐ使いが　生まれついての強者……
　隊長ゴルゴンザを　倒すことでンス。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62061.en:
. This is my last request. Can you help me defeat Captain Gorgonza? This is my dream
too!
62061.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。これが　最後の頼みでンス。
　隊長ゴルゴンザを　倒してもらえないでンスか？
　これは　ボクの夢でもあるでンス！<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26333.en:
I have been asked to do a quest. Do
you accept this quest?
<select>
Accept
Stop
<select_end><close>
26333.ja:
クエストを　依頼されました。
このクエストを　受けますか？
<select>
うける
やめる
<select_end><close>
26333.ko:
퀘스트 의뢰를 받았습니다.
이 퀘스트를 수락하겠습니까?
<select>
수락하기
그만두기
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hans:
对方委托了任务。
要接受这个任务吗？
<select>
接受
放弃
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hant:
對方提出了任務委託。
是否要承接這件任務？
<select>
承接
放棄
<select_end><close>

62062.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>Oh, thank you! Thank you so much! I
entrusted all my dreams and master's
dreams to <pc>!<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62062.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「おお！　ありがたいでンス！
　ボクの夢も　ご主人さまの夢も
　ぜんぶ　<pc>さんに託したでンスよ！<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62063.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>I hope he will go there with his
monster and show Gorgonza the strength
of the item master!<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62063.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「魔物を従えた状態で行って
　ゴルゴンザに　どうぐ使いの強さを
　見せつけてやってほしいでンスよ！<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

62064.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>Oh, thank you! Thank you very much!
Thank you very much.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62064.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「おお！　ありがたいでンス！
　ありがたいでンスが…………<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62065.en:
I have a lot of requests. Now is the time to get things done, so I'm going to go take
care of that quickly!
62065.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん　頼まれごとで
　いっぱいでンス。今は　一刻を争う時でンスから
　早く　そっちを片付けてくるでンスよ！<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62066.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>I see. But in this world, the only one
we can rely on is <pc>.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62066.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「そうでンスか……。でも　この世界で
　頼れるのは　<pc>さんだけでンス。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62067.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>I am sure that the master is hoping
that <pc> will come. I'll be
waiting and believing in you.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62067.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「きっと　<pc>さんが来てくれることを
　ご主人さまも　望んでいるはずでンスよ。
　ボクは　信じて　待ってるでンスからね。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62068.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001><pc>. This is my last
request. I want you to defeat Captain
Gorgonza with monster in tow.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62068.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。これが　最後の頼みでンス。
　魔物を従えている状態で
　隊長ゴルゴンザを　倒してきてほしいでンスよ。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62069.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>He is in the depths of Megilaza Cave
in the Megistris Territory of the
Pukuland Continent.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62069.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「奴は　プクランド大陸の　メギストリス領にある
　メギラザの洞くつの最深部に　いるでンス……。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62070.en:
I entrusted all my dreams and the master's dreams to . Let me remind you of the strength of the
item master.
62070.ja:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「ボクの夢も　ご主人さまの夢も
　すべて　<pc>さんに託したでンスよ。
　どうぐ使いの強さを　思い知らせるでンス。<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62071.en:
<start_lip_sync m08300 _normal m00001>Sir. The gate is already completed.
Are you ready to return to Demon
World?<stop_lip_animation m08300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62071.ja:
<start_lip_sync m08300 _normal m00001>「隊長殿。ゲートは　すでに完成しております。
　そろそろ　魔界へ戻られますか？<stop_lip_animation m08300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62072.en:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>No, we're not going back yet. Let's
wait until the item master comes.<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62072.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>「いや　戻るのは　まだだ。
　こやつが言う　どうぐ使いとやらが
　来るまで　待つとしよう。<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62073.en: <start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Oh, wow!<cs_pchero>Oh my god!!!<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62074.en:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>Oh-ho. You are the item master? I've
been waiting for you.<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62074.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>「ほほう。お前が　どうぐ使いか。
　待ちかねたぞ。<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62075.en:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>I wanted to see what Delcroix's
Research had accomplished, even if it
meant leaving Demon World.<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62075.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>「魔界を抜け出してまで　極めんとした
　デルクロアの研究成果が
　どれほどのものか　見たくなってな。<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62076.en:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>It seems that Delcroix's dream is to
defeat me with his own item master.<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62076.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>「聞けば　デルクロアの夢というのは
　自らが生み出した　どうぐ使いの手で
　この私を　倒すことらしいではないか。<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62077.en:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>Then, if I defeat you and shatter your
dreams, he will listen to me.<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62077.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10700 _normal m00001>「ならば　お前を倒し
　その夢を　粉々に打ち砕けば　こやつも
　私の言うことを　素直に聞くようになるだろう。<stop_lip_animation m10700 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62078.en:
Gorgonza took out a small bottle and
downed it in one gulp!
62078.ja:
ゴルゴンザは　小さなビンを取り出すと
そのまま　一気に飲み干した！

62079.en:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Nuh-nuh-nuh. That guy. Using
I-enhancement pills, that's serious.<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62079.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ぬぬぬぬ……。アイツめ……。
　ワガハイの強化薬を使うとは　本気だな……。<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62080.en:
item masterNow is the time to show the true value of item master! Now is the time to show the true value of item master!
Believe in the power of Kisama!
62080.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「どうぐ使い　<cs_pchero>よ！
　今こそ　どうぐ使いの真価を見せる時！
　キサマのチカラを　信じるのだ！<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62081.en: <start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>Come on, come on! ITEM MASTER!<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62081.ja: <start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「さあ　来い！　どうぐ使い！<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62082.en:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>Well, the item master has been
defeated. It's time to go back to
Demon World.<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62082.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「さて　どうぐ使いは倒した。
　そろそろ　魔界へ戻るとするか。<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62083.en:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Nuh-nuh-nuh. Is this all there is to
it now?<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62083.ja: <start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ぬぬぬぬ……。もはや　これまでか……。<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62084.en:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Oh, wow. We've been waiting for you.<cs_pchero>Come on! Now let's show him the
strength of the item master!<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62084.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「お……おお。待っていたぞ　<cs_pchero>！
　さあ　今度こそ　どうぐ使いの強さを
　こいつに　教えてやるのだ！<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62085.en:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>Funny! No matter how many times you
come back, you will smash Delcroix's
dreams to smithereens!<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62085.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「面白い！　何度　来ようが
　デルクロアの夢もろとも
　粉々に　打ち砕いてくれるわ！<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62086.en: <start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>Come on, come on! ITEM MASTER!<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62086.ja: <start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「さあ　来い！　どうぐ使い！<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62087.en:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>Ba, you idiot. I, who put forth my
best effort, was defeated. item master
Is it as good as this?<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62087.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「バ　バカな。
　全力の私が　敗れるなど……。
　どうぐ使い……　これほどのものか。<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62088.en:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>Delcroix. It seems I was wrong. Your
research is quite practical.<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62088.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「デルクロアよ……。
　どうやら　私が　まちがっていたようだ。
　お前の研究は　充分　実戦に役立つ……。<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62089.en:
When you return to Demon World, I promise to set up a laboratory exclusively for you. There, you can do
as much research on items as you like.
62089.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「魔界に戻ったら　お前専用の研究所を
　用意すると約束しよう。そこで　好きなだけ
　どうぐの研究をするがいい。<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62090.en:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>I dedicated laboratory. If there is
one.<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62090.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ワガハイ専用の研究所……。
　それが　あれば……。<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62091.en: <start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>You idiot. The answer is no.<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62091.ja: <start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「バカめ。答えは　ノーだ。<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62092.en: <start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>What? Are you serious?<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62092.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「なんだと……？
　お前　本気なのか！？<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62093.en:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Haha! I'm not interested in Demon
World now! I'm sure the natives will
make the most of my research.<cs_pchero>I'm glad I met you!<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62093.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「ふははは！　今さら　魔界になど興味ないわ！
　ワガハイの研究を　最大限に活かしてくれる
　原住民…<cs_pchero>に　出会えたのだからな！<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62094.en:
Come on! Run back home and tell the nobles of Demon World that this is the Item Master's Era! From now on, it's
the Item Master's Era!
62094.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「さあ！　とっとと　逃げ帰って
　魔界の貴族どもに伝えるのだ！
　これからは　どうぐ使いの時代だと！<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62095.en: <start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>Oh, boy. Remember. Delcroix.<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62095.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「お…おのれ……。覚えておけよ。
　デルクロア……。<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62096.en:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>You have rebelled against the Lords of
the Demon World. I will make you
regret that decision.<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62096.ja:
<start_lip_sync m10703 _normal m00001>「お前は　魔界の大貴族である
　あの方に　反旗をひるがえしたのだ。
　いずれ　その決断を後悔させてやるわ……。<stop_lip_animation m10703 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62097.en:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>This proves that I am right in
thinking that the item master is the
most powerful.<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62097.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「これで　どうぐ使いこそが最強だという
　ワガハイの考えが　正しいと　証明されたな。<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62098.en:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>I am very grateful to you. It's all
thanks to Kisama.<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62098.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>よ。
　すべて　キサマのおかげだ。<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62099.en: <start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>Kisama was a wonderful item for me.<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
62099.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05803 _normal m00001>「……キサマは　ワガハイにとって
　じつに　すばらしい　どうぐであったぞ。<stop_lip_animation m05803 CLOSE_MOUTH>
